statements: UPDATE email_tracking SET open_rate = 0.75, click_through_rate = 0.20 WHERE email_id = 1;

UPDATE email_tracking SET click_through_rate = 0.5, open_rate = 0.7 WHERE email_id = 100;
UPDATE email_tracking SET timestamp = '2022-01-08 08:30:00', open_rate = 0.6, click_through_rate = 0.4 WHERE email_id = 200;
UPDATE email_open_rates SET open_location='New York' WHERE email_id=123
UPDATE email_click_through_rates SET click_location='California', click_time='2022-05-10 08:30:00' WHERE email_id=456
UPDATE email_open_rates SET open_time = '2022-01-01 08:00:00', open_location = 'New York' WHERE email_id = 1234;
UPDATE email_click_through_rates SET click_time = '2022-01-02 10:30:00', click_location = 'Los Angeles' WHERE user_id = 5678;
UPDATE email_campaigns SET campaign_name = 'Summer Sale' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE email_open_rates SET recipient_email = 'example@email.com' WHERE campaign_id = 2;
UPDATE email_campaigns SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 1
UPDATE email_open_rates SET recipient_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE campaign_id = 2

UPDATE email_campaigns SET end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 501;

UPDATE email_campaigns SET end_date = '2021-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 100;
UPDATE email_campaigns SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE email_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Clicked', interaction_date = '2022-06-30 12:00:00' WHERE interaction_id = 101;
